com.continuuity.weave.filesystem
Interface LocationFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ForwardingLocationFactory, HDFSLocationFactory, LocalLocationFactory
public interface LocationFactory

Factory for creating instance of Location.

Method Summary
 Location create(String path)
          Creates an instance of Location of the given path.
 Location create(URI uri)
          Creates an instance of Location based on URI uri.
 Location getHomeLocation()
          Returns the home location.
 

Method Detail

create

Location create(String path)
Creates an instance of Location of the given path.

Parameters:
path - The path representing the location.
Returns:
An instance of Location.

create

Location create(URI uri)
Creates an instance of Location based on URI uri.

Parameters:
uri - to the resource on the filesystem.
Returns:
An instance of Location

getHomeLocation

Location getHomeLocation()
Returns the home location.
